member.name: T:BooseApp.BooseWrapper
member.summary: Thin wrapper for BOOSE library. If the native BOOSE DLL is present in Resources, it will attempt to call it. Otherwise, a minimal internal interpreter will simulate moveto/drawto/circle/rect/pencolour/write for checkpoint purposes.

member.name: M:BooseApp.BooseWrapper.RunProgram(System.String,System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox)
member.summary: Executes the given BOOSE-like program text.

member.name: M:BooseApp.BooseWrapper.GetPenPosition
member.summary: Returns the current pen position (for tests).
